org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.remotese.nativese

Interface INativeReaderService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SlaveAPI

    public interface INativeReaderService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String connectReader(org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader localReader)
      Connect Physical Local Reader to Remote reader Creates a Session to exchange data with this Reader with an option to duplex connection
      java.lang.String connectReader(org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader localReader, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
      Connect Physical Local Reader to Remote reader Creates a Session to exchange data with this Reader with an option to duplex connection
      void disconnectReader(java.lang.String sessionId, java.lang.String nativeReaderName)
      Disconnect Physical Local Reader from RemoteSe Master, nativeReaderName must be used as the identifier of the nativeReader

    • Method Detail

      • connectReader

        java.lang.String connectReader(org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader localReader)
        Connect Physical Local Reader to Remote reader Creates a Session to exchange data with this Reader with an option to duplex connection
        Parameters:
        localReader - nativeReader to be connected to Master
        Returns:
        sessionId id of the session of the virtual reader
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.exception.KeypleReaderException - if reader is already connected

      • connectReader

        java.lang.String connectReader(org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader localReader,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
        Connect Physical Local Reader to Remote reader Creates a Session to exchange data with this Reader with an option to duplex connection
        Parameters:
        localReader - nativeReader to be connected to Master
        options - map of parameters to set into the virtual reader
        Returns:
        sessionId id of the session of the virtual reader
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.exception.KeypleReaderException - if reader is already connected

      • disconnectReader

        void disconnectReader(java.lang.String sessionId,
                      java.lang.String nativeReaderName)
        Disconnect Physical Local Reader from RemoteSe Master, nativeReaderName must be used as the identifier of the nativeReader
        Parameters:
        sessionId - (optional)
        nativeReaderName - local name of the reader, will be used coupled with the nodeId to identify the virtualReader
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.exception.KeypleReaderException - if reader is not already connected

      • findLocalReader

        org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.Reader findLocalReader(java.lang.String nativeReaderName)
        Find a local reader across plugins
        Parameters:
        nativeReaderName - : native name of the reader to find
        Returns:
        Reader : card Reader found
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.exception.KeypleReaderNotFoundException - : if none reader was found
